differences.change_description: Color change from blue to green
differences.details: The button in the top-right corner has changed color from blue in the baseline screenshot to green in the updated screenshot. This change may affect user recognition and interaction with the button.
The header text has been updated from 'Welcome' to 'Hello'. This is a minor change that may not significantly impact user experience.
The input field has been shifted slightly to the left in the updated screenshot. This change could affect the layout and alignment of the form elements.
A new link has been added to the bottom-left corner of the updated screenshot. This addition could provide new navigation options for users.
The icon in the bottom-right corner has increased in size. This change is minor and may not significantly impact user interaction.

analysis.reasoning: Matches JIRA ticket UI-001 for 'Forgot Password?' but missing question mark
Exactly matches JIRA ticket UI-002 for password field changes
Register button changed to 'Sign Up' with no corresponding JIRA ticket
Header added per UI-004 but About link not positioned on extreme right as specified

analysis.overall_assessment: Found 1 minor issue and 2 critical regressions that need escalation
